body_html:
The exec env - part is not actually executed by Blaze, it's just (IIRC) so that it's easy to achieve similar behavior when you copy-paste the command into your terminal.

It's getting late here, so I'll continue tomorrow. Adding @philwo and @ulfjack in case they have a clever idea.

body:
The `exec env -` part is not actually executed by Blaze, it's just (IIRC) so that it's easy to achieve similar behavior when you copy-paste the command into your terminal.

It's getting late here, so I'll continue tomorrow. Adding @philwo and @ulfjack in case they have a clever idea.
